com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects

Class CTranslation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects.CDrawable
      • com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects.CTransform
        • com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects.CTranslation

  • public class CTranslation
extends CTransform
    Created by emmanuel.proulx on 2017-08-27. Represents a translation towards a certain direction, which in turn is represented by a vector.
